text: @Mike_Pence @VP @WhiteHouse “BRUSSELS — With American cities burning and the coronavirus still raging, killing more people than in any other country, President Trump also has growing problems overseas. He has never before been so isolated and ignored, even mocked.” https://t.co/9PggU8REJl
